name: DDI Development
description:
DDI Development is a reliable provider of the web and mobile solutions for startups, nonprofits, big and middle size enterprises. With more than 100 completed projects under our belt, the team of versatile experts have enhanced the expertise in building e-learning platforms, recruitment and financial systems, CRMs and e-commerce web sources, etc.
Cost and time efficient. Setting the project goals the major objective is always considered. We are dedicated to delivering the product which greatly contributes to the revenue of a client’s company and is completed within required timeframe.
Agile and responsive. Responsive methodologies we apply let clients specify desired functionality in the midst of a project life cycle which allows to adapt an outcome to the market constantly evolving.
Trusted and devoted. We encourage long-lasting relationships to deliver not only a robust software but also to raise it during a lifetime. 71% of our clients return to scale their existing products, refactor them, or to receive ongoing maintenance. That’s why building trustful relationships is our core philosophy.
